```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(maps)
```

```{r}
mydata <- read.csv("C:/Users/mildo/Downloads/covid_cases.csv")
```

```{r}
cases <- mydata[,1]
city <- mydata[,2]
date <- mydata[,3]
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(mydata, aes(City, Date, fill = Cases))
p + geom_tile() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = .5)) +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Blues", direction = 1) +
  ggtitle("NCR's Weekly COVID-19 Positive Cases")
```

```{r}
states_map <- map_data("state")
states_map
```
